subject: AM Brief: Fri, 31 May 2024
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was cautious. USD strengthened amid concerns over Lebanese Pound.

**Key Event Today:** AU Employment Data at 14:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Becker Group downgraded to Overweight
- Bloomberg: Nostrum commemoro cervus accommodo cetera utique reiciendis demulceo.
- AFR: Aggredior voco talio corona tener terreo.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.

subject: URGENT: Portfolio Adjustment for NPF
body:
Thomas -

Client instruction just came down. We need to hedge our exposure to the small-cap portfolio.

Please drop everything and model out the implications. I need execution levels and a full impact analysis on my desk in 2 hours.

Sarah Connor

--
Sarah Connor
Managing Director, Portfolio Manager
J.P. Morgan Asset Management
Sydney, Australia
Tel: +61 2 9003 8888
